DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective demonstrate safety efficacy non-awake implantation method ( EMG neuromonitoring ) SCS paddle lead compare awake implantation method ( local anesthesia patient feedback ) .This post-market , prospective , multicenter , parallel design , non-randomized , non-blinded , 6-month study . Patients successful SCS trial indicate permanent implantation approach participate study prior permanent implantation . Patients recruit enrolled physician one involve site . Each Investigator use one method ( awake non-awake ) accord his/her typical practice . Patients receive treatment enrol physician .
